pages.title: Kamen Rider MetsubouJinrai
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Zero-One Others: Kamen Rider MetsubouJinrai (2021, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/metsuboujinrai_driver)MetsubouJinrai Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed V$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste V$(li)Jump Boost V$(li)Strength VI
